info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:28PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TULARE COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM PDT... At 227 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles east of Three Rivers, or 32 miles northeast of Porterville. The storms are nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bearpaw Ranger Station, Mineral King Ranger Station, Atwell Mill Campground, Cold Springs Campground, Wolverton Point, Quinn Patrol Cabin, Pear Lake Ranger Station, Farewell Gap, Wet Meadows, and Redwood Meadow Patrol Cabin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
